request.description:
API for valid delivery locations for plant
Object Name: Z_MM_STOCK_DLVY_LOC
Inputs: Acct group, plant (both are mandat)

API for matreq details
Object Name: Z_MM_MATREQ_MATDOC_DTL
Inputs: Either Matreq No or material document no, posting date. Material number,batch number, movement type(Optional)

API for matreq details
Object Name: Z_MM_MATREQ_ORDER_DETAILS
Inputs: Matreq No

API to get matreq status
Object Nmae:Z_MM_MATREQ_ORDER_STATUS
Input: matreq no

item.name: MTB MMS_Used_Create MatReq Order - Z_MM_STOCK_MATREQ_CREATE Copy

request.description:
API for Create MatReq Order
Object Name:Z_MM_STOCK_MATREQ_CREATE
Inputs: Micron Part Number, Quantity and Unit of Measure

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:sap-com:document:sap:rfc:functions">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <urn:Z_MM_STOCK_RETURN_CREATE>
         <BEHAVE_WHEN_ERROR></BEHAVE_WHEN_ERROR>
         <BINARY_RELATIONSHIPTYPE></BINARY_RELATIONSHIPTYPE>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <CONVERT></CONVERT>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <EXTENSIONIN>
         </EXTENSIONIN>
         <INT_NUMBER_ASSIGNMENT></INT_NUMBER_ASSIGNMENT>
         <LOGIC_SWITCH>
            <PRICING></PRICING>
            <ATP_WRKMOD></ATP_WRKMOD>
            <SCHEDULING></SCHEDULING>
            <NOSTRUCTURE></NOSTRUCTURE>
            <COND_HANDL></COND_HANDL>
            <ADDR_CHECK></ADDR_CHECK>
         </LOGIC_SWITCH>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <PARTNERADDRESSES>
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
          
         </PARTNERADDRESSES>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN>

         </RETURN>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CFGS_BLOB>

         </RETURN_CFGS_BLOB>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CFGS_INST>

         </RETURN_CFGS_INST>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CFGS_PART_OF>

         </RETURN_CFGS_PART_OF>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CFGS_REF>

         </RETURN_CFGS_REF>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CFGS_REFINST>
 
         </RETURN_CFGS_REFINST>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CFGS_VALUE>
         </RETURN_CFGS_VALUE>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CFGS_VK>

         </RETURN_CFGS_VK>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_CONDITIONS_IN>
         </RETURN_CONDITIONS_IN>
         <RETURN_HEADER_IN>
            <DOC_TYPE>ZRTS</DOC_TYPE>
            <SALES_ORG>MY01</SALES_ORG>
            <DISTR_CHAN>99</DISTR_CHAN>
            <DIVISION>01</DIVISION>
           
            <REQ_DATE_H>2020-01-14</REQ_DATE_H>
            <ORD_REASON>7E2</ORD_REASON>
            <PURCH_NO_C>TEST</PURCH_NO_C>
  
         </RETURN_HEADER_IN>
         <RETURN_HEADER_INX>
            <DOC_TYPE>X</DOC_TYPE>
            <SALES_ORG>X</SALES_ORG>
            <DISTR_CHAN>X</DISTR_CHAN>
            <DIVISION>X</DIVISION>
            <REQ_DATE_H>X</REQ_DATE_H>
            <ORD_REASON>X</ORD_REASON>
           
            <PURCH_NO_C>X</PURCH_NO_C>
           
         </RETURN_HEADER_INX>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_ITEMS_IN>
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <item>
               <ITM_NUMBER>000001</ITM_NUMBER>
               <MATERIAL>340-00054</MATERIAL>
               <PLANT>MY01</PLANT>
               <TARGET_QTY>1</TARGET_QTY>
            </item>
         </RETURN_ITEMS_IN>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_ITEMS_INX>
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <item>
               <ITM_NUMBER>000001</ITM_NUMBER>
  
               <MATERIAL>X</MATERIAL>
               <PLANT>X</PLANT>
               <TARGET_QTY>X</TARGET_QTY>
              
            </item>
         </RETURN_ITEMS_INX>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_KEYS>
         </RETURN_KEYS>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_PARTNERS>
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <item>
               <PARTN_ROLE>WE</PARTN_ROLE>
               <PARTN_NUMB>0000000102</PARTN_NUMB>
            </item>
         </RETURN_PARTNERS>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_SCHEDULES_IN>
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <item>
               <ITM_NUMBER>000001</ITM_NUMBER>
               <SCHED_LINE>0001</SCHED_LINE>
               <REQ_DATE>2020-01-13</REQ_DATE>
               <REQ_QTY>1</REQ_QTY>
            </item>
         </RETURN_SCHEDULES_IN>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_SCHEDULES_INX>
            <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            <item>
               <ITM_NUMBER>000001</ITM_NUMBER>
               <SCHED_LINE>0001</SCHED_LINE>
               <REQ_DATE>X</REQ_DATE>
               <REQ_QTY>X</REQ_QTY>
            </item>
         </RETURN_SCHEDULES_INX>
         <!--Optional:-->
         <RETURN_TEXT>
         <item>
          <DOC_NUMBER></DOC_NUMBER>
          <ITM_NUMBER></ITM_NUMBER>
          <TEXT_ID>02</TEXT_ID>
          <LANGU>E</LANGU>
          <LANGU_ISO>E</LANGU_ISO>
          <FORMAT_COL></FORMAT_COL>
          <TEXT_LINE>Order Type</TEXT_LINE>
          <FUNCTION></FUNCTION>
         </item>
         </RETURN_TEXT>
         <SALESDOCUMENTIN></SALESDOCUMENTIN>
         <SENDER>
            <LOG_SYSTEM></LOG_SYSTEM>
         </SENDER>
         <TESTRUN></TESTRUN>
      </urn:Z_MM_STOCK_RETURN_CREATE>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

request.description:
API for Create Return Order
Object Name:Z_MM_STOCK_RETURN_CREATE
MC99 to MC15

API to check for stock room material availability
Object Name: Z_MM_STOCK_BATCH_QTY
Inputs: Material, plant (multiple possible)

API to check for storage location stock by parts
Object Name: Z_MM_STOCK_SLOC_STOCK
Inputs: material no and plant (multiple possible)

item.name: MMS_Used Fr SF01 to MC99 - Z_MM_STOCK_LINE_RETURN

request.description: this is for moving stock from storage location sf01 to mc99

item.name: MMY MMS_Used Fr MC99 to SAP - Z_MM_STOCK_LINE_ISSUE

request.description:
stock will be moving to sap from matreq
for that ref we create material document to cross check in the sap

API to get list of parts in a storage location
Object name: Z_MM_STOCK_SLOC_PARTS
Inputs: material type, material group, plant and storage location (All inputs are optional but either plant or storage location must be specified) can you please put a validation here

API For goods movement generic function
Object Name: Z_MM_STOCK_GOODS_MVT
Inputs: Movement code, posting date, document date, Items:material no, storage loc, movement type, batch,move_stloc,move_batch ( based on goods movement code, inputs will be vary)

API for order reason by cost center or list of order reasons
Object Name: Z_MM_STOCK_COST_CENTER
Inputs: Cost center,dist channel,division,language,controlling area,sales org.
